j4careRouterRouteConfigurationQueueName.title: Queue Name
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationQueueName.description: DCM4CHEE Queue Name used for Jobs

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationSourceFind.title: Source Find AET
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationSourceFind.description: AET to Query when retrieving Input Data (HL7,IAN,...) to search for studies

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationSourceRetr.title: Source Retrieve AET
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationSourceRetr.description: AET to Retrieve Study from Input Data

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationNextVerifi.title: Next Verification Delay
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationNextVerifi.description: Number of Minutes that should be added to Next Verificaton Date to synchronize the Routing Tasks

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationBodyPartMa.title: Body Part Mapping
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationBodyPartMa.description: Map Body Parts to make them compareable (f.e. HEAD=HEAD,SKULL,HEADNECK)

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationBodyPartSc.title: Body Part Score
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationBodyPartSc.description: Score that should be used if a body part was matched translated via the configured Body Part Map - 0 will deactivate the body part matching

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationMaxRetriev.title: Maximum Retrieve Tasks
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationMaxRetriev.description: The maximum number of Retrieve Tasks that should be created based on the found datasets ordered by score - 0 will deactivate the feature

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationMinScore.title: Minimum Score
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationMinScore.description: The minimum score a study needs to reach to be considered for Routing - 0 will deactivate the feature

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationCronExpres.title: Cron Expression
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationCronExpres.description: Cron Expression to determine the next available Schedule Time for the Routing Order to be processed

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationPurgingDel.title: Purging Delay Canceled Tasks
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationPurgingDel.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMnS after which canceled tasks are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular route.

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationPurgingDel.title: Purging Delay Completed Tasks
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationPurgingDel.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMnS after which completed tasks are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular route.

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationPurgingDel.title: Purging Delay Failed Tasks
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationPurgingDel.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMnS after which failed tasks are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular route.

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationPurgingDel.title: Purging Delay Warning Tasks
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationPurgingDel.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMnS after which warning tasks are purged. If absent, there is no deletion for that particular route.

j4careRouterRouteConfigurationHL7Configu.title: HL7 Configuration URI Prefix
j4careRouterRouteConfigurationHL7Configu.description: URI Prefix to setup the HL7 Listener
